message: I still haven't told her everything.
I haven't mentioned my encounter with Toue in Rhyme.
After everything she just said, how can I? If she learns that Toue contacted me...
I feel guilty for keeping secrets, but it's better than making her worry.
After that, Granny gets up from the sofa and pulls something from one of the shelves.

name: タエ
message: "Take this with you. I changed the formula. It should help with your headaches again."
